about_the_game:
The "Streamer Guy" is doing his routine live stream while his frustration serves as content and entertainment. In the midst of it, he reaches his limit and, after rage-quitting, decides to embark on a journey of self-discovery to find out who he is and what his position is in the world and the universe. Help Streamer Guy in this difficult journey using only a mouse!

Enjoy:


A simple mechanic! Move the mouse cursor using the center of the screen as the base, and Streamer Guy will move in the same intensity. Anyone can get the hang of it!

Punitive level design? You punish yourself, the level design doesn't react! With that in mind, you'll do very well in this peculiar platform and climbing game :D

Super personalized gameplay time! Your skills and persistence will completely dictate the game's duration. You're in charge!

Curiously random and mysteriously satisfying scenarios! (Wow) Talk to NPCs during the journey!

Microscopic budget! (But 100% effective!) You wouldn't expect anything less from this genre of game, especially coming from an indie group called "rotten post" :)

Have fun at a low cost or give it as a gift to your dear friend ;)
